major_achievements.hardware_integration: Engineered low-level software-to-hardware interfaces for physical simulation equipment (steering columns, haptic weapon replicas) with zero-latency data communication

major_achievements.achievement: Pixel-Perfect UV Texture Coordinate Scoring System
major_achievements.problem_identified: Traditional VR weapon simulators relied on arrays of invisible physics colliders for projectile hit detection - computationally expensive and prone to boundary clipping errors
major_achievements.solution: Innovated dynamic pixel-perfect scoring system leveraging texture coordinates (UV coordinates)
methodology: Generated discrete color-coded reference map mapped to target object
Used Unity's Raycast function to detect instantaneous hit points
Extracted precise UV coordinates from RaycastHit struct
Algorithmically sampled underlying pixel color at coordinates (e.g., green = 10 points, red = 5 points)
